plain: Raiders of the Lost Ark is an action-adventure film, Office Space is a comedy, Entrapment and Ghostbusters are heist films, The Sixth Sense is a horror film, and 10 Things I Hate About You and Cruel Intentions 2 are romantic comedies. Candleshoe and Mickey Blue Eyes are both mysteries. All of these films have a musical score, but none of them are musicals. The mood of the musical score can vary from film to film, but the setting, visual style, and writing style are all over the place. The runtime of these films varies from under 90 minutes to over 2 hours. The themes of these films vary from heist to horror to romance to mystery.
